headline: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June
intro: Despite a 4% gain in benchmark indices in 2025, Indian equity markets remain volatile due to global trade tensions. InCred Equities recommends 21 stocks with an ?Add? rating, highlighting a favorable monsoon and strong GVA growth as key positives for investors.
imagecaption: Stock Market Strategy: InCred Equities lists 21 stocks to buy this June

headline: HDFC Bank credit card charges changing from July 1: What you need to know
intro: HDFC Bank has made some changes to its credit cards program from 1st July. There will be a 1% charge on wallet loading, utilities, fuel, online skill-based gaming transactions, etc., if the spend in each category exceeds a specified limit.
imagecaption: HDFC Bank updates credit card charges from July 1?know the new rules.

headline: Tata Steel, JSW Energy to HDFC AMC: 5 stocks to trade ex-dividend today
intro: Dividend Stocks: Tata Steel, JSW Energy, HDFC AMC, Container Corporation of India and Bank of Baroda are among the five stocks that will trade ex-dividend today.
imagecaption: Dividend Stocks:  5 Stocks to trade Ex dividend today

headline: After bulking up through M&A, Cult.fit now faces a fitness test
intro: Cult.fit is backed by marquee names: Accel, Temasek, Chiratae Ventures, Zomato, Tata Capital and HDFC Bank among others. Now, it is planning an IPO, which will be a milestone event for India?s fitness industry. However, some analysts have concerns.
imagecaption: Cult.fit built a large pan-India footprint through an aggressive acquisition strategy?the company has snapped up over 20 startups since inception.

headline: Sensex today snaps three-day losing run, rises nearly 260 points; Nifty holds above 24,600; railway stocks shine
intro: Indian stock market saw a rebound on June 4, with significant gains in the Nifty 50 and Sensex, driven by major firms like HDFC Bank. Investor attention is on global trade dynamics and the upcoming RBI monetary policy meeting, expecting a repo rate cut.
imagecaption: Sensex today snaps three-day losing run, rises nearly 260 points; Nifty holds above 24,600; railway stocks shine

headline: HDFC Bank share price edges higher after SEBI's nod to HDB Financial Services IPO
intro: HDFC Bank share price has remained flat in one month and has risen over 12% in three months. The banking stock has gained 8% YTD, while it is up 30% in one year. HDFC Bank shares have rallied 20% in two years and have delivered 92% returns in the past five years.
imagecaption: HDFC Bank share price has rallied 20% in two years and has delivered 92% returns in the past five years.

headline: HDB Financial gets regulator's nod for  ?12,500-crore IPO
intro: The IPO of HDFC Bank's subsidiary will comprise a fresh issue of up to  ?2,500 crore and an offer for sale of up to  ?10,000 crore, according to the DRHP filed in October.
imagecaption: At $1.5 billion, it would be the largest IPO by a NBFC in India and the biggest across sectors since Hyundai Motor India Ltd?s $3.3 billion listing last year.
